Get more Lanying IM services

Further enhance your performance and security by using Lanying IM for a wide range of value-added services from Public Cloud Business Edition, Proprietary Cloud, and Private Cloud

Custom information subscription

Custom information subscription enables user message or online state subscription, with appropriate filtering rules

Enable custom information subscription

Advanced API calls

Advanced API calls, through which you can query user’s online status or send a message to all application users

Enable advanced API calls
